title: Promising Boxing Career Ending In Collecting Garbage - Kamal's Story Is Of The Forgotten Hero
text:
Kamal Kumar is not a name or face you would recognise on the streets. But the man at one time was the best boxers we had at national level. Three district level golds are a testimony to that. This was of course in the 90s. Now what does he do? Pull a rickshaw and collect garbage to make ends meet.

BCCL

Sounds pathetic right? Well, it is an all too familiar tale for Indian athletes. Once their glory days are behind them, they fall through the cracks.

PTI

Kamal admits his temper is one of the reasons he did not make it much further in boxing and hoped to become a coach after his days in the ring where over. But he did not have enough money to support him and his family and so had to resort to these odd jobs.

Don't Miss 1.1 K SHARES 8.9 K SHARES 15 K SHARES 307 SHARES

He hopes his sons take up boxing and is trying to get a loan from the government. Sadly there has been no reply till now.

Twitter

A budding career that ended abruptly, Kamal is just a reminder of what happens to sportspersons when they are no longer at the top. One hopes the authorities hear his pleas soon.
